products.title: Luna Softshade Slate Grey Day And Night Blind
products.description: This blind has a unique look that is sleek and stylish as well as highly practical for a modern living space. The luna softshade slate grey day and night roller blind can be easily adjusted to suit any time of day, the weather and your mood. It can be completely closed or open, or adjusted to the semi closed position with strips of voile between the solid slate grey fabric panels. This mode allows for an element of privacy with the benefit of natural light.

products.title: Luna Softshade Flint Grey Day And Night Blind
products.description: Enjoy a peaceful and uplifting ambience in your home with the luna softshade flint grey day and night roller blind. This blind features a design of alternating cool grey fabric and voile strips that looks ultra smart and contemporary and allows plenty of light to penetrate whilst maintaining a sense of privacy. products.title: Hoxton Softshade Zinc Grey Day And Night Blind
products.description: Maintain a light and airy feel in your home with the hoxton softshade zinc grey day and night roller blind. Boasting an innovative design of alternating solid fabric and voile strip panels you can enjoy more versatility with your window covering. This design allows for privacy with plenty of natural light, or you can close the blind completely for more shade. The stony grey hue is ideal for blending with cool modern schemes.

products.title: Hoxton Softshade Silver Grey Day And Night Blind
products.description: Make a stylish and practical interior update with the hoxton softshade silver grey day and night roller blind. The design of alternating grey fabric and voile strip panels creates visual impact that will look really smart within a contemporary interior, whilst at the same time this day and night roller blind provides privacy with plenty of natural light so you can maintain a light and bright ambience.
